alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 1:49PM MST until March 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Wind gusts to 30 mph leading to areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Interstate 80 Corridor near Arlington and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions possible due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
